title: AOA's Yuna talks about how she maintains her figure with 'CeCi' | allkpop.com
text: Or Login / Register With Us Forgot Password? Remember Me AOA's Yuna talks about how she maintains her figure with 'CeCi' By jennywill 4 minutes ago 955 60 0 0 Google+ Yuna shared her fitness tips with ' CeCi '! She had a photoshoot with the magazine and revealed that her body was made through pilates. During the interview, she said, " I eat fruits and vegetables all the time. When we start promotions, I start taking care of what I eat. Lately, instead of drinking water and getting full without any nutrition, I've been drinking chrysanthemum tea and orange rind tea to fill up on both water and nutrition. "
